meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in certain plants of the genus Delphinium.
meanings.sent1: The delphinine in the plant can be harmful if ingested.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of delphinine on the human body.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally ate the delphinine and started dancing around.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like delphinine, poisoning his mind with doubt.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the delphinine flowers warned of their toxic nature.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the genus Delphinium.
meanings.sent1: The delphinine flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The delphinine characteristics of the plant attracted many butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome wore a hat shaped like a delphinine flower.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as vibrant as a delphinine meadow in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of delphinine beauty in his painting.
